trans-unit.source: Represents the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 表示公历。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元︰ 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the GregorianCalendar class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: GregorianCalendar 类的此实现识别当前纪元 (A.D.

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For information about using the GregorianCalendar class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在.NET Framework 中使用 GregorianCalendar 类和其他日历类的信息，请参阅[使用日历](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by 4, unless it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 闰年公历日历中定义为一年，除非它是由 100 可被 4，整除。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days).
February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years.
trans-unit.target: 2 月有 29 天在闰年和 28 在平年。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > By default, all <xref:System.DateTime> and <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values express dates and times in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 默认情况下，所有<xref:System.DateTime>和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值 express 中公历日期和时间。</xref:System.DateTimeOffset> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar was developed as a replacement for the Julian calendar (which is represented by the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class) and was first introduced in a small number of cultures on October 15, 1582.
trans-unit.target: 公历开发，作为罗马儒略历的替换 (这由<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>类) 和上 1582 年 10 月 15，少量的区域性中首次推出。</xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: When working with historic dates that precede a culture's adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the original calendar if it is available in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 当处理历史日期之前的公历的区域性的采用，应使用原始的日历，如果它是在.NET Framework 中可用。

trans-unit.source: For example, Denmark changed from the Julian calendar to the Gregorian calendar on February 19 (in the Julian calendar) or March 1 (in the Gregorian calendar) of 1700.
trans-unit.target: 例如，丹麦从更改罗马儒略历为公历日历年 2 月月 19 日 （在儒略历） 或 3 月 1 日 （公历） 中的 1700年上。

trans-unit.source: In this case, for dates before the adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the Julian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，对于之前的采用公历日期，应使用罗马儒略历。

trans-unit.source: However, note that no culture offers intrinsic support for the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意任何区域性提供<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>类</xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>的内部支持

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class as a standalone calendar.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>作为独立日历类。</xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see .
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates that February 18, 1700 in the Julian calendar, which is the last day the Julian calendar was officially used in Denmark, is one day earlier than March 1, 1700 in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 1700 年 2 月 18，罗马儒略历，即罗马儒略历正式丹麦中使用的最后一天中为早于 1700 在公历日历年 3 月 1，一天。

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.globalization.g_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.globalization.g_0_1.vb)] Each <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> supports a set of calendars.
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.globalization.g_0_1.cs)][!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.globalization.g_0_1.vb) ]每个<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>支持一组的日历。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>属性返回区域性的默认日历和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>属性返回一个包含所有支持的区域性的日历数组。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the calendar used by a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, the application can set the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，应用程序可以设置此<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性设置为新<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>。</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar></xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>的日历

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A> ignores punctuation in abbreviated era names, only if the GregorianCalendar is selected in <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the culture uses "A.D."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A>仅当在<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>并且区域性使用"公元"</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>选择 GregorianCalendar 忽略缩写的纪元名称中的标点</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A>

trans-unit.source: as the era name, that is, "A.D."
trans-unit.target: 作为纪元名称，即"公元"

trans-unit.source: is equivalent to "AD".
trans-unit.target: 等效于"AD"。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref> class using the default <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>类使用默认<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes> value is <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes>.
trans-unit.target: 默认<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes>值为<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes>。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is set to a <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> that is created with this constructor, the dates and times are localized in the language associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>设置为<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>创建使用此构造函数、 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>关联的语言本地化的日期和时间</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>属性</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>类使用指定<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref> value that denotes which language version of the calendar to create.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"> </xref>值，该值指示要创建的日历的语言版本。

trans-unit.source: type is not a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: type不是成员的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> that is the specified number of months away from the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个<xref:System.DateTime>，它是指定的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>离开的月数</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The year part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>如果外部的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>年，则结果月份影响</xref:System.DateTime>生成的年份部分

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持仅当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果结果年份外部的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>纪元，则引发</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 时间的日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>与指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>相同</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定的月份是年 10 月，其中包含 31 天，指定的日期是该月第 31 天和的值`months`参数为 6，则结果年份是一个超过指定的年份，结果月份是年 4 月，和结果的日期是 30 日，即年 4 月的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`months`参数是负数，<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime></xref:System.DateTime>生成

trans-unit.source: The<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性的返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，如以下示例所示。</xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.g_8_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.g_8_1.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.g_8_1.vb)][!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5 ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.g_8_1.cs)]

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to which to add months.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>向其添加月数。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The number of months to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的月份数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>添加指定的月数到指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>而产生</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.DateTime>超出支持的范围。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: months is less than -120000.
trans-unit.target: months小于-120000。

trans-unit.source: -or- months is greater than 120000.
trans-unit.target: -或-months大于 120000。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> that is the specified number of years away from the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个<xref:System.DateTime>，它是指定的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>离开的年数</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The month part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 月部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>与指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>相同</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持仅当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果结果年份外部的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>纪元，则引发</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 时间的日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>与指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>相同</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days.
trans-unit.target: 例如，年 2 月有 28 天，但在闰年时它有 29 天。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 28th day of February in the following year.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期是闰年 2 月 29 日和的值`years`为 1，则结果日期将是第二中下一年的年 2 月 28 日。

trans-unit.source: If `years` is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`years`为负，<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime></xref:System.DateTime>生成

trans-unit.source: The<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性的返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，如以下示例所示。</xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to which to add years.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>向其添加年。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The number of years to add.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的年份数。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>添加指定的到指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>的年数而产生</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.DateTime>超出支持的范围。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current era.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元︰ 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类只识别当前纪元 (公元</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.source: This field always returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 此字段始终返回 1。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前日历是阳历、 阴历还是二者的组合。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref href="System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref href="System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref> value that denotes the language version of the current <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref>值，该值指示当前的语言版本<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref> value that denotes the language version of the current <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"> </xref>值，该值指示当前的语言版本<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in a set operation is not a member of the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中指定的值不是成员的<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，当前实例是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of eras in the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取中的纪元列表<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元︰ 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类只识别当前纪元 (公元</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns an array with only one element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回包含仅有一个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers that represents the eras in the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的纪元的整数的数组<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>中的每月天数

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day of the month in time.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 1 和 31 之间表示月中的天的 time 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the week in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>星期几

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DayOfWeek> values are Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DayOfWeek>的值为星期一到星期日、 星期一、 星期二、 星期三、 星期四、 星期五、 之间。</xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the day of the week in time.
trans-unit.target: A值，该值表示在星期几 time 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>年的某一天

trans-unit.source: The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year.
trans-unit.target: 每年的日期被指从该年度的第一天的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, GetDayOfYear for the first day of the first month returns 1, and GetDayOfYear for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，第一个月的第一天的 GetDayOfYear 返回 1，和上个月的最后一天的 GetDayOfYear 这一年，这是相同的值由<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>.</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>返回总天数

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in time.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 1 到 366 表示的年份中的天的 time 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纪元中的指定年份的指定月份的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 28 or 29 for February (`month` = 2), depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法返回 28 或 29，年 2 月 (`month` = 2)，具体取决于`year`是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元中的指定年份中指定的月份的天数。

trans-unit.target: era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法返回 365 或 366，具体取决于是否`year`是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元︰ 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类只识别当前纪元 (公元</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year in time.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中指定的日期是否为闰日。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外的整除的年份。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰日是仅在闰年中发生了一天。

trans-unit.source: In the Gregorian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历的年 2 月 29 日是唯一的闰日。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 31 之间的整数，表示日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的日期是闰日，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- month is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-month超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- day is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-day超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified month in the specified year in the specified era is a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中的指定年份中的指定的月份是否为闰月。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外的整除的年份。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰月是仅在闰年中发生的整月。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar does not have any leap months.
trans-unit.target: 公历没有闰月。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, unless overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，除非由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- month is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-month超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified year in the specified era is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中的指定的年份是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外的整除的年份。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的年是闰年，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 获取最新的日期和时间受<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref> type, which is the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最新的日期和时间受<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>类型，即的那一刻年 12 月 31 日公元 9999 年

trans-unit.source: and is equivalent to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 获取最早的日期和时间受<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: Although the value of the MinSupportedDateTime property is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E., the Gregorian calendar was not introduced until October 15, 1582, and its adoption throughout the European continent and worldwide was slow.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 MinSupportedDateTime 属性的值是第一个时间的 1 月 1 日公元 0001 年，直到 1582，年 10 月 15，不引入公历和在欧洲 continent 和全球整个其采用速度太慢。

trans-unit.source: Until they adopted the Gregorian calendar, most cultures in the European, American, and Australian continents used the Julian calendar, which is represented by the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class.
trans-unit.target: American，和澳大利亚洲直到它们采用公历在欧洲，大多数区域性使用儒略历，由<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>类。</xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: The earliest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref> type, which is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最早的日期和时间受<xref href="System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar"></xref>类型，即的那一刻 1 月 1 日公元 0001 年

trans-unit.source: and is equivalent to <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.</xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> that is set to the specified date and time in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.DateTime>它被设置为指定的日期和指定纪元中的时间。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 31 之间的整数，表示日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 23 that represents the hour.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 0 到 23 之间的整数，表示小时。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the minute.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 59 之间的整数，表示分钟。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the second.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 59 之间的整数，表示第二个。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 999 that represents the millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 999 之间的整数，表示毫秒。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>，设置为指定的日期和时间以当前纪元。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- month is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-month超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- day is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-day超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- hour is less than zero or greater than 23.
trans-unit.target: -或-hour小于零或大于 23。

trans-unit.source: -or- minute is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: -或-minute小于零或大于 59。

trans-unit.source: -or- second is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: -或-second小于零或大于 59。

trans-unit.source: -or- millisecond is less than zero or greater than 999.
trans-unit.target: -或-millisecond小于零或大于 999。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax*> property to determine the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，通过使用<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax*>属性来确定相应的纪元。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>是可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>

trans-unit.source: The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range.
trans-unit.target: 通过查找两位数字的唯一匹配项来确定世纪`year`该 100 年范围内。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>设置为 2029，则 100 年范围是从 1930年为 2029年。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: ToFourDigitYear supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: ToFourDigitYear 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。

trans-unit.source: Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> value representing the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 将两位数年份值 (小于 100) 传递会导致方法的值转换为一个四位数字值根据<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>值，该值表示相应的纪元。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to ToFourDigitYear, the method returns the actual input value.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序提供在 ToFourDigitYear 到了受支持的日历的范围内的四位数年份值，该方法将返回实际的输入的值。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序提供一个四位数字值超出了支持的日历，或者它提供了负值，则该方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.
trans-unit.target: 两位数或四位整数，它表示要转换的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，包含的四位数字表示形式 year 。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许两位数年份，要正确转换为 4 位数年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此属性设置为 2029年，100 年范围是从 1930年为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。

trans-unit.source: However, that information can change during the life of the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该信息可以更改<xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>的生命周期内

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类不会检测系统设置中的更改自动。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应将此值设置为 99，以指示按字面解释 2 位数字的年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此属性设置为 99，100 年范围为 0 （不是有效值对于大多数日历而言） 和 99 之间。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 30。

trans-unit.source: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中指定的值是小于 99。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value specified in a set operation is greater than <xref uid="langword_csharp_MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" name="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-指定在集运算中的值大于<xref uid="langword_csharp_MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" name="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，当前实例是只读的。
